h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: Get your hits in on her face when she returns to float in front of you, and be ready for the boss to whip around and prepare new attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Get your hits in on her face when she returns to float in front of you, and be ready for the boss to whip around and prepare new attacks.
